recipe_def.assumptions: Assemble chamber per BOM; imported compute/sensors.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse route; add leak/pressure testing later.

steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.
ISRU route using regolith metal; 5% casting loss, 2% rolling loss, 3% machining loss
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant using regolith_metal_crude from regolith. Enables local production of sheet metal and structural steel.

steps.notes: Fabricate chamber shell sections, end caps, and flanges from steel plate
Weld chamber shell with hermetic seals for atmosphere control, install access ports and penetrations
Machine flange faces and port threads for gas-tight sealing
Pressure test chamber for leak-tightness and atmosphere containment capability

recipe_def.assumptions: Heavy-duty steel construction with hermetic welding for controlled atmosphere applications. Leak-tested to ensure gas-tight operation for inert atmosphere or vacuum processing.
recipe_def.notes: Sealed chamber shell for controlled atmosphere processing equipment. Hermetic construction maintains inert gas or vacuum environment. Total fabrication time ~14 hours.

recipe_def.assumptions: Assemble chamber per BOM; imported compute/sensors.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse route; add leak/pressure testing later.
